pageContext.claim: “And North Korea, that's moving along. You know, when I came in, we were -- there were missiles going all over the place, there was nuclear testing. Mountains were being moved over a little bit. Mountains. They said, "Boy, that's terrible what's happening over there." They thought it was earthquakes. I said, "That's not an earthquake. That's called nuclear testing."”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence to support this claim. Trump exaggerates the possibility of war, which had been heightened by his own harsh rhetoric.
